name: Dummynator
author: LUBUS

sections.description:
Disclaimer: Experimental plugin to extend gutenberg. Have any suggestion feel free to send a PR or open an issue.

Quickly insert dummy content

Usage

  • Simply activate and new menu / sidebar will be registered
  • Insert dummmy content

Roadmap

  • More features & options

If you have any suggestions/Feature request that you would like to see in the upcoming releases , feel free to let us know in the issues section
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard
1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
2. Search for Dummynator or upload zip file
3. Activate Dummynator from your Plugins page

Manual Installation
1. Download “Dummynator”.
2. Upload the dummynator directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
3. Activate Dummynator from your Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
v1.1.0

Released on 30th June 2018

  • Toolbar pinning
  • WordPress dependencies as ES modules
  • Minor UI tweaks

v1.0

Released on 30th April 2018

  • Initial plugin release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

From your WordPress dashboard
1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
2. Search for Dummynator or upload zip file
3. Activate Dummynator from your Plugins page

Manual Installation
1. Download “Dummynator”.
2. Upload the dummynator directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
3. Activate Dummynator from your Plugins page.
